greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = numerator of n/(n+19).
comment: a(n) <> n iff n = 19 * k, in this case, a(n) = k. - _Bernard Schott_, Feb 19 2019
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: Dirichlet g.f.: zeta(s-1)*(1 - 18/19^s). - _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 18 2011
program: (Sage) [lcm(n,19)/19 for n in range(0, 100)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 12 2009
(PARI) vector(100, n, n--; numerator(n/(n+19))) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 19 2019
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 15 2005
